news.title: NSBE Jr. Chapter Wins Regional Competition
news.content: Our chapter placed first in the Regional Science Olympiad! Congratulations to all participants for their dedication and hard work.

news.title: New STEM Workshop Series Announced
news.content: Join us for a series of hands-on STEM workshops starting next month! Topics include robotics, coding, and engineering design.

news.title: NSBE National Convention Registration Open
news.content: Register now for the NSBE National Convention! Join thousands of students and professionals for workshops, networking, and inspiration.

news.title: Robotics Competition Team Advances to Finals
news.content: Our robotics team has qualified for the state finals! Join us in cheering them on at the championship next month.

news.title: College Visit Day - Applications Open
news.content: Applications are now open for our annual college visit day. Visit top engineering schools and meet with admissions representatives.

news.title: Regional Conference Early Bird Pricing
news.content: Save on registration for the Region VI Fall Leadership Conference! Early bird pricing ends this week.

news.title: Scholarship Opportunity for Members
news.content: A new scholarship program is available for active NSBE Jr. members. Applications due by the end of the month.

news.title: Community Service Project Success
news.content: Thank you to everyone who participated in last weekend's community cleanup. Together we made a real difference!

news.title: Coding Challenge Winners Announced
news.content: Congratulations to our top performers in the regional coding challenge! Their innovative solutions impressed the judges.

news.title: National Conference Travel Fund Available
news.content: Limited travel scholarships available for members attending the National NSBE Convention. Apply by October 20th.
